properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
LAMPEDUSA TO SICILY.
DNC 09.
MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V PIETRO NOVELLI
IN VICINITY OF TRACKLINE JOINING LAMPEDUSA
(35-30.93N 012-34.38E) TO PORTO EMPEDOCLE
(37-18.00N 013-32.00E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
